info.name: Tumblr - Remove <big> spam and smaller titles
info.description:
Removes the <big><big><big> spam that causes overly long, obnoxious posts
And also makes the titles on posts smaller, similar to how they were before the updates on May 30th, 2013.
info.additionalInfo: http://theblackparrot.tumblr.com/ come say hi if you'd like to :P
